message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a product that I believe would be incredibly valuable to you. I've set the price at $1,300,000. Given its potential worth, I believe this is a very reasonable offer.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product you're offering. However, my budget allows me to pay no more than $1,200,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement that works for both of us.
Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but the value of this product is truly significant.  I could come down to $1,250,000, which I believe is a fair compromise.
Alice, thank you for considering my budget. I would like to propose a price of $1,200,000 for the product. This price aligns more closely with what I am able to offer at this time.
